shortdesc.ph: Specifies the playback audio track of the current music file.
Specifies the audio track to play in the current music file.
Specifies the playback audio track of the current music file.
Specifies the audio track to play in the current music file.

section.p: After getting the number of audio tracks in the music file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. For example, if a multi-track file contains songs in different languages on different tracks, you can use this method to set the playback language.

After retrieving the number of audio tracks in a music file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. For example, if different tracks in a multi-track file contain songs in different languages, you can use this method to set the playback language.

After obtaining the number of audio tracks in the music file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. For example, if a multi-track file contains songs in different languages on different tracks, you can use this method to set the playback language of the music file.

After retrieving the number of audio tracks in the music file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. For example, if different tracks in a multi-track file contain songs in different languages, you can call this method to set the playback language of the music file.

ul.li: For supported audio file formats, see [What audio file formats does the RTC SDK support?](https://doc.shengwang.cn/faq/general-product-inquiry/audio-format).
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
For supported audio file formats, see [What audio file formats does the RTC SDK support?](https://doc.shengwang.cn/faq/general-product-inquiry/audio-format).
You must call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
For supported audio file formats, see [What audio formats does the RTC SDK support?](https://doc.shengwang.cn/faq/general-product-inquiry/audio-format).
You must call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
For supported audio file formats, see [What audio formats does the RTC SDK support for playback?](https://doc.shengwang.cn/faq/general-product-inquiry/audio-format).
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.

plentry.pd: The specified playback track. The value range should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than the return value of .
The specified audio track to play. The value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than the return value of .
The specified playback audio track. The value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than the return value of .
The specified audio track to play. The value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than the return value of .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
